commit message: Add Italian translations
Log SysUtil.showError() messages in logcat always
Fix apostrophes in Italian translations
Restart logger command on unexpected terminations
Fix possible null-pointer-exception
nflog: move cleanup to atexit() function, and handle first recvfrom ENOSPC/ENOBUFS errors
Update nflog binaries
Add method to md5sum a string; reuse MessageDigest object
Add method to get iptables rules as String
Check iptables rules every two minutes for changes; reapply rules if change occurs so logging is always properly in-front or behind
Ensure all nflog instances are killed when starting/stopping logging
Minor clean-up of previous commit
Stop watching rules before removing rules
On unexpected termination, sleep 10 seconds before restarting (to avoid wasting cpu/battery)
Lower default max log entries to 75000
Update max log entries value to 75000 on existing devices
Replace 'checkRules' with 'getRules' in getRules()
Wrap iptables rules watchdog functionality with a toggle preference
Add Catalan translations
Fix apostrophes in Catalan translations
Update translations
Added Spanish translations
Update German translations
Fix upload/download speed counters not resetting after each display
Update version to 2.16.0
